title: Getsuyoubi no Tawawa
synopsis: The anime follows a salaryman who has a chance meeting with a girl named Ai on the train. They begin to meet every Monday on the train, with the man serving as her bodyguard on the crowded commute while they chat.
related_anime: ['Getsuyoubi no Tawawa', 'Getsuyoubi no Tawawa 2', 'Getsuyoubi no Tawawa Specials']
voices: ['Harada, Sayaka', 'Kayano, Ai', 'Majima, Junji', 'Takumi, Yasuaki', 'Ishigami, Shizuka', 'Kanemoto, Hisako', 'Noto, Mamiko', 'Tsuda, Minami', 'Souma, Kouichi']
